title: (x) Two Decorative Sans-Serif Fonts From Bills - Thesis TheMix, GST Polo {Chris K, Jan}
content:
I think both of these fonts are interesting. Does anyone know what either of them is, or if they are custom? They are from british gas and "e-on".

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120306211845im_/http:/typophile.com/files/britgas-font_3770.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120306211845im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eon-font_6626.jpg)
author: Fontophile

comments.content: Top one is Thesis The Mix.

Wow. The second one seems to be GST Polo.

[http://www.typemanufactur.com/eng/fonts/polo/overview.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120306211845/http:/www.typemanufactur.com/eng/fonts/polo/overview.html "http://www.typemanufactur.com/eng/fonts/polo/overview.html")

(Very rare!)
Wow, this board continues to amaze me! Many thanks to both Chris and Jan.

@ Jan:  
Yes, rare. But Polo is the corporate type of e.on since the beginning of this company.
